languages.text: "Когда-то это была дикая планета, полная ксенотварей и совершенно непригодная для выращивания чего бы то ни было. И по сей день, несмотря на все наши усилия, Янус регулярно бунтует против нас. Землетрясения, цунами, появление нового сорняка, который душит пашни, или вредителя... порой мне кажется, будто эта планета наделена сознанием — сознанием капризного и упрямого ребенка, которому нравится портить все, чего мы добились!"

traits.locale_text: "Когда-то это была дикая планета, полная ксенотварей и совершенно непригодная для выращивания чего бы то ни было. И по сей день, несмотря на все наши усилия, Янус регулярно бунтует против нас. Землетрясения, цунами, появление нового сорняка, который душит пашни, или вредителя... порой мне кажется, будто эта планета наделена сознанием — сознанием капризного и упрямого ребенка, которому нравится портить все, чего мы добились!"

languages.text: "This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"
languages.original_text: "Когда-то это была дикая планета, полная ксенотварей и совершенно непригодная для выращивания чего бы то ни было. И по сей день, несмотря на все наши усилия, Янус регулярно бунтует против нас. Землетрясения, цунами, появление нового сорняка, который душит пашни, или вредителя... порой мне кажется, будто эта планета наделена сознанием — сознанием капризного и упрямого ребенка, которому нравится портить все, чего мы добились!"

traits.locale_text: "House Vyatt has ruled on Janus for many generations, and each new governor has without fail contributed to the Agri-World's development. This world was once a wild planet, full of xeno-beasts, and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. But I... we... did everything we could to turn this grubby rock into a glittering diamond of the Imperium."

"This world was once a wild planet, full of xeno-beasts, and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade arable lands... sometimes I can't help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

This world was once a wild planet, full of xeno-beasts, and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. But I... we... did everything we could to turn this grubby rock into a glittering diamond of the Imperium."

Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

"This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

languages.text: “这个世界曾是颗蛮荒的行星，上面满是异兽，完全不适合种植任何东西。即便是现在，哪怕我们尽了最大努力，加努斯还是经常会造反。地震、海啸、新的害虫、入侵耕地的杂草……有的时候，我不禁会觉得这个世界是有意识的。它就像一个任性而顽固的孩子一样，想要摧毁我们已经获得的一切！”
languages.original_text: "This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

traits.locale_text: “这个世界曾是颗蛮荒的行星，上面满是异兽，完全不适合种植任何东西。即便是现在，哪怕我们尽了最大努力，加努斯还是经常会造反。地震、海啸、新的害虫、入侵耕地的杂草……有的时候，我不禁会觉得这个世界是有意识的。它就像一个任性而顽固的孩子一样，想要摧毁我们已经获得的一切！”

languages.text: «Este mundo era un planeta salvaje, lleno de bestias xenos y completamente inadecuado para el cultivo de cualquier tipo. Incluso ahora, pese a nuestros constantes esfuerzos, Janus se rebela contra nosotros de forma incesante. Terremotos, tsunamis, la aparición de especies de plagas y hierbajos que invaden los campos de cultivo... a veces juraría que el propio planeta está vivo... ¡y que tiene el temperamento de un niñato malcriado al que le gusta tirar por tierra todo lo que hemos conseguido!».
languages.original_text: "This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

traits.locale_text: «Este mundo era un planeta salvaje, lleno de bestias xenos y completamente inadecuado para el cultivo de cualquier tipo. Incluso ahora, pese a nuestros constantes esfuerzos, Janus se rebela contra nosotros de forma incesante. Terremotos, tsunamis, la aparición de especies de plagas y hierbajos que invaden los campos de cultivo... a veces juraría que el propio planeta está vivo... ¡y que tiene el temperamento de un niñato malcriado al que le gusta tirar por tierra todo lo que hemos conseguido!».

languages.text: 「この星はもともとはゼノビーストであふれ、何を育てるにもまったく適さない荒野の惑星でした。今日まで手を尽くしてきたにもかかわらず、ヤヌスでは定期的に反乱が起きています。地震、津波、新たな疫病の発生、そして耕地を侵食する雑草…時々、この星には意思があるとしか思えなくなるのです――私たちが積み上げてきたなにもかもを台無しにして喜ぶ、気まぐれで意地っ張りな子供の意思が！」
languages.original_text: "This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

traits.locale_text: 「この星はもともとはゼノビーストであふれ、何を育てるにもまったく適さない荒野の惑星でした。今日まで手を尽くしてきたにもかかわらず、ヤヌスでは定期的に反乱が起きています。地震、津波、新たな疫病の発生、そして耕地を侵食する雑草…時々、この星には意思があるとしか思えなくなるのです――私たちが積み上げてきたなにもかもを台無しにして喜ぶ、気まぐれで意地っ張りな子供の意思が！」

languages.text: "Diese Welt war einst ein wilder Planet, voller Xenobestien und gänzlich ungeeignet, irgendetwas anzubauen. Bis heute begehrt Janus trotz aller Bemühungen regelmäßig gegen uns auf. Erdbeben, Tsunamis, neue Seuchen und Unkraut, die über das das Ackerland herfallen – manchmal überkommt mich der Gedanke, dass diese Welt ein Bewusstsein hat – das Bewusstsein eines launischen und sturen Kindes, das alles kaputt machen will, was wir erreicht haben!"
languages.original_text: "This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Welt war einst ein wilder Planet, voller Xenobestien und gänzlich ungeeignet, irgendetwas anzubauen. Bis heute begehrt Janus trotz aller Bemühungen regelmäßig gegen uns auf. Erdbeben, Tsunamis, neue Seuchen und Unkraut, die über das das Ackerland herfallen – manchmal überkommt mich der Gedanke, dass diese Welt ein Bewusstsein hat – das Bewusstsein eines launischen und sturen Kindes, das alles kaputt machen will, was wir erreicht haben!"

languages.text: « C'était autrefois une planète sauvage qui grouillait de xénobêtes et qui ne se prêtait absolument pas à l'agriculture. Encore aujourd'hui, malgré nos efforts acharnés, Janus se rebelle régulièrement contre nous. Séismes, tsunamis, nouveaux animaux et plantes nuisibles qui envahissent les terres arables... Parfois, je ne peux m'empêcher de penser que ce monde est doué d'une conscience, celle d'un enfant capricieux et têtu qui s'amuse à détruire tout ce que nous avons accompli ! »
languages.original_text: "This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

traits.locale_text: « C'était autrefois une planète sauvage qui grouillait de xénobêtes et qui ne se prêtait absolument pas à l'agriculture. Encore aujourd'hui, malgré nos efforts acharnés, Janus se rebelle régulièrement contre nous. Séismes, tsunamis, nouveaux animaux et plantes nuisibles qui envahissent les terres arables... Parfois, je ne peux m'empêcher de penser que ce monde est doué d'une conscience, celle d'un enfant capricieux et têtu qui s'amuse à détruire tout ce que nous avons accompli ! »

languages.text: "Bu dünya bir zamanlar vahşi bir gezegendi, zenohayvanlarla doluydu ve hiçbir şey yetişmezdi. Bugün bile onca çabamıza rağmen Janus, düzenli olarak bize isyan ediyor. Depremler, dev dalgalar, ekilebilir arazileri istila eden yeni haşereler ile yabani otlar... Bazen bu dünya bilinç sahibi olabilir mi diye düşünmeden edemiyorum. Başardığımız her şeyi mahvetmeyi seven, kaprisli ve inatçı bir çocuk olsa bu kadar olurdu!"
languages.original_text: "This world was once a wild planet, full of xenobeasts and utterly unsuitable for growing anything. To this day, despite our best efforts, Janus regularly rebels against us. Earthquakes, tsunamis, the emergence of new pests and weeds that invade the arable land... sometimes I cannot help but think that this world is endowed with consciousness — the consciousness of a capricious and stubborn child who likes to spoil everything that we have achieved!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünya bir zamanlar vahşi bir gezegendi, zenohayvanlarla doluydu ve hiçbir şey yetişmezdi. Bugün bile onca çabamıza rağmen Janus, düzenli olarak bize isyan ediyor. Depremler, tsunamiler, ekilebilir arazileri istila eden yeni haşereler ile yabani otlar... Bazen bu dünya bilinç sahibi olabilir mi diye düşünmeden edemiyorum. Başardığımız her şeyi mahvetmeyi seven, kaprisli ve inatçı bir çocuk olsa bu kadar olurdu!"
